about_the_game:
Realistic Flight Training

The tracks on which the actual game was played and
the surrounding environment are organized as closely as possible,
providing an experience as if you were playing a real game when flying.

Play With Friends

With Online Multiplayer Support, you can play against friends or players from all over the world.
Compete and set a record to see who gets the first goal.

Physics customization

It provides a flight similar to the movement of a real drone.
Also, the physical variables and the beta flight Rate variable value can be adjusted.
Customize and enjoy flying for your real drone flying experience.

Various flight controller joysticks and gamepads can be operated when controlling a drone (Calibratable)

On the Control page, you can set various flight controller joysticks and gamepads such as Frsky, xbox, and fly.
If possible, it is recommended to fly with a flight controller joystick such as Frsky.

Analyze and improve the flight results of you and your friends

You can record and play back the flight of you and your friends.
Change the viewpoint to another player, free camera mode, playback speed control, etc.
Analyze and improve your flight results.

Implement the Feel Of the Goggles Screen

Real goggle screen resolution, FOV, noise effect, etc. are provided on the monitor screen.
And if you have VR equipment and Steam VR installed, experience the goggles screen displayed on the VR headset.


Thank you for your interest in the game.
If you have any issues related to bugs or dev,
please email to support@ar-bridge.com or leave a comment on Community Hub.
Thank you.
detailed_description:
Realistic Flight Training

The tracks on which the actual game was played and
the surrounding environment are organized as closely as possible,
providing an experience as if you were playing a real game when flying.

Play With Friends

With Online Multiplayer Support, you can play against friends or players from all over the world.
Compete and set a record to see who gets the first goal.

Physics customization

It provides a flight similar to the movement of a real drone.
Also, the physical variables and the beta flight Rate variable value can be adjusted.
Customize and enjoy flying for your real drone flying experience.

Various flight controller joysticks and gamepads can be operated when controlling a drone (Calibratable)

On the Control page, you can set various flight controller joysticks and gamepads such as Frsky, xbox, and fly.
If possible, it is recommended to fly with a flight controller joystick such as Frsky.

Analyze and improve the flight results of you and your friends

You can record and play back the flight of you and your friends.
Change the viewpoint to another player, free camera mode, playback speed control, etc.
Analyze and improve your flight results.

Implement the Feel Of the Goggles Screen

Real goggle screen resolution, FOV, noise effect, etc. are provided on the monitor screen.
And if you have VR equipment and Steam VR installed, experience the goggles screen displayed on the VR headset.


Thank you for your interest in the game.
If you have any issues related to bugs or dev,
please email to support@ar-bridge.com or leave a comment on Community Hub.
Thank you.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra version 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2x2048MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra version 10.12 or newer
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2x2048MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: FPV Speed Drone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10x64 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (2.70 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Keyboard and mouse required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10x64 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (2.70 GHz) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The FPV Speed ​​Drone is set in an environment where an actual international game was held. It provides a realistic FPV drone racing flight experience. Compete with your friends and set the best record!
